AuraCount.desc: Return the stack number of [auraName] on [actor] from a given [source]

IsReady.desc: Returns true if the skill [skillName] can be used. For combo skills, returns true if the skill is active in a combo chain

IsOffGCD.desc: Returns true when the rotation is in an off GCD state

AuraTimeRemaining.desc: Returns the time in seconds remaining for [auraName] on [actor] from a given [source], or 0 if the aura can't be found

CooldownRemaining.desc: Returns the time in seconds remaining before [skillName] is available
